name: Hit and Run (Yeperdeedooda)
description:
A hack and slash - platformer - bullet hell? Yea, I don't know either I hope you enjoy whatever I managed create! 

Some text may be cut off when not in fullscreen! Also I'm sorry the cover image look's like it was drawn by a 3 year old... i swear I'm good at art :~:

But anyway Enjoy!
